ValidationRule.description: [Req 3682] BusinessPartnerRole = End Customer , Customer Compliance cannot be set equal to US Govern)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name<>$Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name , AND ( RecordType.Name = 'Prospect' , AND ( ISPICKVAL(BusinessPartnerRole__c , "End Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Customer_Compliance__c, "US_Govern") ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When End Customer is selected for Business Partner Role, the Customer Compliance cannot be set to US Govern. Please select another value for Customer Compliance.
